<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deep Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=4633) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 107 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[enigma muse](/Muses.aspx?ID=1); Legendary in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)

</column>

---

Your repertoire is vast, containing far more spells than usual. Add one spell to your repertoire of each spell rank you can cast.
name: Deep Lore
